name: SimpleTiles
description:
SimpleTiles is a rudamentary top-down exploration game where you roam a procedurally generated world. You can collect resources, explore in underground caves, extract valuable resources, and build your home.

SimpleTiles is currently in an extremely early state of development and has very little in terms of features/quality control. This is also my first legitimate Godot project (and my first legitimate 2D project in years), so things might be a little rough initially. Early development builds may contain random menus or keybinds that a new user will not understand how to use, so read up on the devlogs for extra information.
